attributes.action: STOP MALE DOMESTIC ABUSE - MORE RESOURCES NEEDED URGENTLY
attributes.additional_details:
MORE RESOURCES ARE NEED TO HELP MALE VICTIMS OF DOMESTIC ABUSE. THEY NEED TO FEEL SAFE ENOUGH TO COME FORWARD AND ASK FOR THE HELP WITHOUT THE WORRY OF NOT BEING BELIEVED.
THEY NEED REFUGES TO GET TO SAFETY.
THERE IS VALUABLE HELP OUT THERE FOR FEMALE DOMESTIC ABUSE, NOW IT'S TIME TO SHOW THE MALE VICTIMS THAT THEY TOO HAVE A VOICE.
